title: An answere to maister Smyth seruaunt to the kynges most royall maiestye, and clerke of the Quenes graces councell though most unworthy / [by me a poore man ... W.G.]
author: Gray, William.
publicationStmtPublisher: Imprinted at London by me Rychard Bankes/cum priuilegio ad imprimandum solum. And to be solde in Pater noster rowe by John Turke/at the sygne of the Rose,
